org.aptivate.bmotools.pmgraph
Class GraphFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.aptivate.bmotools.pmgraph.GraphFactory

public class GraphFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The GraphFactory class provides static methods which return JFreeChart objects (which can then be served as web content or saved as images) representing network traffic logged by pmacct on the BMO Box.

Version:
0.1 History: Noe A. Rodrigez Glez. 12-03-2009 Use a standar method to asign colors to series. Changed the way in which the stackedThroughput graph is created in order to make the code more readable. Removed the use of Alpha chanel on graphs because it caused problems with the colors of the series. Added some coments.
Author:
Thomas Sharp
